Program Description \n(guideline): 25% of cost rebate for new, battery-operated E-Bikes, up to $150. Limit of $300 E-bike rebates per account per year.
Equipment Standards Restrictions: New equipment only. Battery equipment only.
Stacking Details: Members may submit multiple e-bike rebates per account per year. Maximum rebate of $300 per account per year for all equipment except riding lawnmowers.
